title: Dart +1
content:
Dart +1 Uncommon 2~5 Damage 1d4 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A dart made of lightweight wood, its feathers carefully cut at a sharp angle Dart 18m Finesse Two-Handed 0.23 40

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A dart made of lightweight wood, its feathers carefully cut at a sharp angle

Dart 18m Finesse Two-Handed

Dart +1 is one of the Ranged Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different rang
